hotels.title: Western Sydney Penrith Escape near Blue Mountains with Outdoor Pool
hotels.description: Retreat to a comfortable base in Western Sydney with a stay at this stylish hotel - the perfect launchpad to discover the region, including the Nepean River and the majestic Blue Mountains. While exploring, visit the Penrith Regional Gallery or enjoy a live performance at the Joan Sutherland Performing Arts Centre. Food lovers can indulge in the region's culinary delights, with an array of local eateries offering everything from modern Australian cuisine to international flavours. The hotel itself boasts a fitness centre, outdoor pool and an inviting lobby bar for evening drinks before retreating to your homey pad.

hotels.title: Western Sydney Penrith Escape near Blue Mountains with Cocktail Bar
hotels.description: Experience the refined elegance of Pullman Sydney Penrith, situated in the heart of Sydney's vibrant western suburbs. This stylish hotel offers a gateway to the picturesque Blue Mountains and the Nepean River, renowned for its scenic walks and picnic spots. Savour delectable cuisine at the onsite restaurant, Marcel, or enjoy a refreshing drink at the chic Tori Bar. The Penrith Panthers entertainment complex, with its array of dining options and live shows, is just a short stroll away. For art enthusiasts, the nearby Penrith Regional Gallery offers a rich cultural experience
